name: Suika Game
overview: Dive into the delicious madness of Suika Game! Developed by Aladdin X, this Japanese puzzle sensation for Nintendo eShop invites players into a fruity frenzy. As the adorable cloud character Poppy, stack and merge fruits to score big points, all while navigating the unpredictable physics of fruit interactions. With no time limit, Suika Game offers a laid-back yet addictive gaming experience. Join the ranks of over three million players who've embraced the juicy challenge, and compete for high scores on the online leaderboard. It's not just a game; it's a fruity adventure waiting to be explored!
